name: Inner Ninja!
description:
Unleash your Inner Ninja!

After training almost all of his life our protagonist is almost ready to end the apocalypse. But first he must test his abilities in the training chamber and see if he can withstand the strain of the arts and brutality of live combat. Race to finish the with the quickest time and submit it to a leaderboard!  ( optional ) Mix of fast paced action, and quick platforming. [fight for the fastest time ] 

Gameplay: 

Team Name: KH1212 ( Solo )

Gameplay Instructions: Slay all of the zombies as quick as you can. Submit your time if you feel confident!

Gameplay Binds:

WASD - Move ( Double tap to roll in corresponding direction )

Shift - Sprint ( Double tap to change off weapon and start full speed sprint )

Space Bar - Jump ( Double jump ) ( Dive bomb if double jumped and in the air ) ( Wall Climbing [HOLD] and Facing the wall )

Mouse wheel up & Down - Cycle weapons

Middle Mouse Down - Fast cycle to unequipped

F - Charge Energy

Tab - Regen Health ( Costs Energy )

1 - AOE explosion ( Only on ground )

2 - Weapon Skill Attacks ( Only on ground )

3 - Projectile ( Can be used Unarmed ) Only on ground

Q - Slide ( Can trip zombies if speed is high enough )

E  - Grapple Hook [ The Particle at the end of your curser is called nebula and wherever it appears you can grapple to ] ( Cant be used with weapons equipped BUT can be double tapped with weapons equipped to swap off and use the grappling hook )  ( 2 second cooldown - cooldown resets if you wall run or wall climb )

Wall Running - In the air next to a wall - Direction keys relevant to body orientation ( Example if the wall is on the left of your characters body you would HOLD down W & A 

Left Mouse Button - Light Attack ( Combo strings are available )

Right Mouse Button - Heavy Attack ( Combo strings are available )

N - Hide enemy health bars if you do not want them

M - Turn ON/OFF music

Packs that i used:

Blockout Tool

Rama Melee Plugin

100+crosshairspack ( 1 Crosshair )

AdvancedLocomotionV4 ( Step SFX )

AdvancedMagicFX12/13 ( Some Particles )

Air Combo ( A few animations used )

Frank 5 pack ( Assassin and Dual animations used )

ClassicZombieSFXv2 ( SFX )

CLazyAnimpack ( Unarmed Animations )

EpicLeaderboard ( For scoreboard at the end )

Explosion Builder ( 1 Particle used )

GoodParticleStatus ( 1 Particle Used )

AoE Magic Abilities ( 1 Particle Used )

Gruesome_Zombie_AnimSet ( Zombie animations )

GunsAndExplosions ( SFX )

Hero_Idle_Pack01 ( 2 Animations used )

MagicProjectilesVol2 ( 2 Particles )

Magic Spells Sounds ( SFX )

MedievalCombatSounds ( SFX )

MegaGame Music Collection ( Music )

VFX Attack Trails ( 1 Particle Used )

Zombie - Bloated Male ( Enemy Zombie )

I basically put all the stuff together. I'm not good at making things from scratch just breathing life into them. Hope you enjoy!
